short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to display a Europeana dataset by EDM Tier

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is aimed at Europeana Aggregators and Content Providers. It allows you to select the Metadata or Content Tier (according to the Europeana Publishing Framework) and view objects at each tier.
